Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.util.jpa

Class Summary
EntityManagerCreator An example of how to create EntityManager's for your components
EntityManagerFactoryCreator An example of how to create EntityManagerFactory's for your components
JPACustomProvider A Custom provider that registers Hibernate optional components: EntityManagerCreator that creates JPA EntityManagers EntityManagerFactoryCreator that creates JPA EntityManagerFactory from a persistence-unit named "default" JPATransactionInterceptor that opens a transaction at the beginning of the request, and commits (or rollbacks) that transaction at the end of the request.
JPATransactionInterceptor An example of JPA Transaction management on VRaptor
